title: The Grumpy Potatoes
description: The Grumpy Potatoes are always grumpy.They've tried everything to make themselves happy, from parties to presents, from trips to treats, but still they remain very, very grumpy potatoes!Why, oh why, are they so grumpy?Will those Grumpy Potatoes ever smile?A new picture book from the creator of Baby Sparkle and My Family Are Superheroes, perfect for raising a smile in even the grumpiest of little spuds.
author: Fitri Silman
